title: Avocado Strawberry Spinach Salad with Poppyseed Dressing
directions: Toss all ingredients together with your desired amount of dressing until combined. Serve immediately.
Whisk all ingredients together until combined.
ingredients: 1 avocado, diced (or you can double this to 2 avocados!)
4 ounces crumbled gorgonzola or blue cheese
half a small red onion, thinly sliced
1/2 cup avocado oil (or any oil, such as olive oil)
